law.catch_line: Each society that applies on or after July 1, 1968, for an initial certificate of authority under th...

text.section: Each society that applies on or after July 1, 1968, for an initial certificate of authority under this subtitle must have working capital of at least $125,000.
After issuance of its initial certificate of authority, a society described in subsection (a) of this section shall maintain unencumbered assets that exceed all liabilities by $100,000.
